targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	MAX(time) as time,
	CAST(terminals AS TEXT) as metric,
	AVG(value) as value
FROM (
	SELECT DISTINCT ON (terminals, benchmark_type)
		time,
		benchmark_type,
		terminals,
		CAST(metrics->>'throughput' AS DOUBLE PRECISION) as value
	FROM oltpbench_results
	WHERE
    $__timeFilter("time") AND
		benchmark_type != 'noop'
	ORDER BY terminals, benchmark_type, time desc
) AS tmp
GROUP BY terminals

SELECT
	time,
	real_throughput, 
	1*expect_throughput AS expect_throughput,
	real_throughput - expect_throughput AS diff_throughput
FROM (
	SELECT
		throughput as real_throughput
	FROM (
		SELECT 
			MAX(time) as time,
			terminals as metric,
			AVG(throughput) as throughput
		FROM (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (terminals, benchmark_type)
				time,
				benchmark_type,
				terminals,
				CAST(metrics->>'throughput' AS DOUBLE PRECISION) as throughput
			FROM oltpbench_results
			WHERE
        $__timeFilter("time") AND
				benchmark_type != 'noop'
			ORDER BY terminals, benchmark_type, time desc
		) AS distinct_table
		GROUP BY terminals
	) AS avg_table
	WHERE metric = 1
) AS real_table 
CROSS JOIN (
	SELECT
		time,
		throughput AS expect_throughput
	FROM (
		SELECT 
			MAX(time) as time,
			terminals as metric,
			AVG(throughput) as throughput
		FROM (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (terminals, benchmark_type)
				time,
				benchmark_type,
				terminals,
				CAST(metrics->>'throughput' AS DOUBLE PRECISION) as throughput
			FROM oltpbench_results
			WHERE
        $__timeFilter("time") AND
				benchmark_type != 'noop'
			ORDER BY terminals, benchmark_type, time desc
		) AS distinct_table
		GROUP BY terminals
	) AS avg_table
	WHERE metric = 1
) AS expect;

SELECT
	time,
	real_throughput,

	real_throughput - expect_throughput AS diff_throughput
FROM (
	SELECT
		throughput as real_throughput
	FROM (

			WHERE
        $__timeFilter("time") AND
				benchmark_type != 'noop'
			ORDER BY terminals, benchmark_type, time desc
		) AS distinct_table
		GROUP BY terminals
	) AS avg_table
	WHERE metric = 2
) AS real_table 
CROSS JOIN (
	SELECT
		time,
		2*throughput AS expect_throughput
	FROM (
		SELECT 
			MAX(time) as time,
			terminals as metric,
			AVG(throughput) as throughput

			SELECT DISTINCT ON (terminals, benchmark_type)
				time,
				benchmark_type,
				terminals,
				CAST(metrics->>'throughput' AS DOUBLE PRECISION) as throughput
			FROM oltpbench_results
			WHERE
        $__timeFilter("time") AND
				benchmark_type != 'noop'
			ORDER BY terminals, benchmark_type, time desc
		) AS distinct_table
		GROUP BY terminals
	) AS avg_table
	WHERE metric = 1
) AS expect;
